tool.name: GEMINI @BINARY@
tool.description: Map genes and variants to KEGG pathways

param.name: ensemble
param.label: Version of ensembl genes to use
param.help: Supported versions: 66 to 71. use versions that match the VEP/snpEff versions of the annotated vcf for correctness. For e.g VEP v2.6 and snpEff v3.1 use Ensembl 68 version of the genomes. (-v)

param.name: lof
param.label: Report only pathways with loss-of-function variants

tool.help:
**What it does**
Mapping genes to biological pathways is useful in understanding the function/role played by a gene. Likewise, genes involved in common pathways is helpful in understanding heterogeneous diseases. We have integrated the KEGG pathway mapping for gene variants, to explain/annotate variation.
This requires your VCF be annotated with either snpEff/VEP.
@CITATION@
